dmTitle.infoName: Service Bulletin - Replacement of standard forward fork by telescopic fork

restrictionInstructions.dataDistribution: To be made available to all S1000D users.

exportRegistrationStmt.simplePara: Export of this data module to all countries that are the residence of organizations that are users of S1000D is permitted. Storage of this data module is to be at the discretion of the organization.

restrictionInstructions.dataHandling: There are no specific handling instructions for this data module.
restrictionInstructions.dataDestruction: Users may destroy this data module in accordance with their own local procedures.
restrictionInstructions.dataDisclosure: There are no dissemination limitations that apply to this data module.

sbProductModificationList.sbProductModification: Installation of telescopic fork with 140mm clearance
Installation of telescopic fork with 100mm clearance

sbTopicContent.para: This document is the 1stissue of the Service Bulletin
Original Issue date
A lot of customers asked for the improvement of the front hanging in order to use the bike in more severe conditions.
Replacement of the fork
This Service Bulletin is applicable to bikes manufactured between 01/05/2001 and 30/09/2009
Configuration no. 1 covers mountain bicycle Mountain storm version Mk1
Configuration no. 2 covers mountain bicycle Brook trekker version Mk9
For any issue with the fork assembly, please contact your local retailer.
The UK MoD Ministry of Defence (United Kingdom) only provides assistance via its network of retailers.
This Service Bulletin is applicable to bikes manufactured between 01/05/2001 and 30/09/2009
The S/N of the impacted bikes are : U8025

The S/N of the impacted bikes are : U8025
U8025
Configuration no. 1 covers mountain bicycle Mountain storm version Mk1
Configuration no. 2 covers mountain bicycle Brook trekker version Mk9

levelledPara.para: Improvement of the bike's front hanging.
A lot of customers would like to use the bike in more severe conditions.

sbTopicContent.para: Replacement of the original fork

levelledPara.para: by telescopic fork with a 140 mm clearance
by telescopic fork with a 100 mm clearance
The modification should be made in accordance with the customer's availability, but within the following limits (before marked wear of the frame)

sbTopicContent.para: This modification has been approved and certified in conformity with the requirements of the S1000D community.
Approval No. .
Removal of the headset
Install of the headset
Removal of the stem
Install of the stem
Testing of the brakes
IPD
For any issue with the fork assembly, please contact your local retailer.
The UK MoD only provides assistance via its network of retailers.

commonInfoDescrPara.para: Check to order the appropriate telescopic fork with a 140 mm clearance
Check to order the appropriate telescopic fork with a 100 mm clearance
